 Terrorsaur:

 

 

Terrorsaur knelt down in front of KitKat. "I'll see if I can find it. Will that be better?" He put his red and gray hand over her head between her ears.


  logomorph@... wrote: 
OOC:( The arm lost was both, organic and mechanical. She's an 
Biotechno being.  The leg was both flesh and bot.)

::KitKat::

Her ears perked up as Drillbit spoke those words.  She stood up on 
all three, "Can you really?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> "Well, I know how to replicate the part. But I dont know anything 
about
> recennecting the part to the body." He says to the group.
> 
> OOC: I believe that the limb is from KitKat's organic parts, if it 
is
> michanical, then scratch the part about DrillBit not knowing how to
> recennect it. He would know how then, cause he is a 
scientist/michanic.
